name: RogueCraft Squadron
description: RogueCraft Squadron is a fast paced real-time strategy space adventure with roguelike elements. Play as a squadron commander fighting against a hostile alien race; collecting resources, researching new ships and building an armada as you fight to survive against overwhelming odds.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: XP or newer Процессор: Intel Core i5 Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Intel HD 5000 or better Место на диске: 500 MB
